scripts.dev: yarn --cwd components-library build && concurrently "yarn --cwd mfe-characters dev" "yarn --cwd mfe-shell dev"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules components-library/node_modules mfe-characters/node_modules mfe-shell/node_modules components-library/dist mfe-characters/dist mfe-shell/dist components-library/src/**/*.js components-library/src/**/*.js.map components-library/__mf__temp components-library/.mf_temp components-library/.vite mfe-shell/__mf__temp mfe-shell/.mf_temp mfe-shell/.vite mfe-characters/__mf__temp mfe-characters/.mf_temp mfe-characters/.vite
scripts.test: yarn --cwd components-library test && yarn --cwd mfe-characters test
scripts.build: yarn --cwd components-library build && yarn --cwd mfe-characters build && yarn --cwd mfe-shell build
scripts.preview: concurrently -c auto "yarn --cwd mfe-characters preview" "yarn --cwd mfe-shell preview"
